casebody.data:
Bryan Ray HARSHMAN, Appellant,
v.
STATE of Missouri, Respondent. WD 81844 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. ORDER FILED: MARCH 19, 2019 Damien De Loyola, Kansas City, MO, Counsel for Appellant. Dora Fichter, Jefferson City, MO, Counsel for Respondent. Before Division Three: Mark D. Pfeiffer, Presiding Judge, Lisa White Hardwick, Judge, Anthony Rex Gabbert, Judge ORDER Per Curiam:

Bryan Ray Harshman appeals from a judgment denying his Rule 24.035 motion for post-conviction relief, without an evidentiary hearing, after he pleaded guilty to the class B felony of possession of a controlled substance (methamphetamine) with intent to distribute, and the class C felony of maintaining a public nuisance. We affirm. Rule 84.16(b).
